titleStmt.title: Tvvo letters from tvvo chief officers under the command of the Earle of Ormond Particularly relating their good and happy successe in their late expedition.
titleStmt.author: B. D. aut
Wyld, Tho. aut

notesStmt.note: Consists of two letters, both dated 21 April; one signed "D.B.", and the other "Tho. Wyld".
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
